attributes.action: add a "Not represented" option to voting slips.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people are not represented in elections by not agreeing with any candidates policies. However, these votes are not counted but classed as void or spoilt. These votes could be counted by having a "Not Represented" box. Large numbers of people may not be represented by the Candididates in their constituencies and are being failed by the democratic process.
